review: Built-in wifi, and access to all of your itunes media, this is a great media device:  Provides access to hulu, netflix, and other subscription services through a great interface.  Easy access to youtube, and direct access to latest posts from the channels you subscribe to.  Showed the itunes music festival -- easier to navigate than on the computer.Also, a great device for airplay -- letting you see your whole computer, iphone or ipad screen on a large display, or just play a video file at full screen size.By itself, it doesn't do anything (no free TV channels, etc.. - though you do get youtube).  But as a conduit for access to your media library and subscription services or for showing stuff from your other devices on the big screen wirelessly without having to plug anything else in, it excels!Highly recommended.

review: I bought this without really reading into what it does. I originally just wanted to stream shows and music videos from Youtube from my Ipod. Imagine my surprise when I finally figured out it comes with it's own apps for those things installed. I've had this for a few months now and I enjoy it. Make sure to buy an HDMI cable since it doesn't come with one to hook into the TV. It's easy to set up even without a keyboard. No complaints so far. Don't lose the remote!
